about:
Hi, I'm a software engineer from Brazil, currently working with Ruby On Rails at Codeminer 42. I'm bachelor in computer science course and during the course my passion for computing and scientific research that already existed got even bigger.During my academic career I participated in scientific research, and my latest publication received recognition at a national event. 

I also strongly focused my studies on market technologies, where I learned technologies such as Java, Python, Javascript, Ruby, PHP, C, C ++ etc.I have knowledge in artificial intelligence, backend development and data analysis and mining.

If you want to get to know me, leave me a message in the chat ðŸ˜„
